Source.Name: perl-Text-Unaccent
Source.Summary: Text::Unaccent - Remove accents from a string
Source.Description: Text::Unaccent is a module that remove accents from a string. unac_string converts the input string from the specified charset to UTF-16 and call unac_string_utf16 to return the unaccented equivalent. The conversion from and to UTF-16 is done with iconv(1).
